headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEASS, SHIRLEY MOLBERT

snippet: LEASS--Shirley Molbert, on Saturday, June 25, age 85. Admired art and antiques dealer, fine artist in her garden. A rare and dynamic woman of beauty, heart and exquisite taste who lived life on her own terms. Survived by children Jeffrey, Robin and Andrew Molbert, granddaughter Evera. Predeceased by husbands Harry Molbert and Reuben Leass. Loved by friends, family, her big dogs. At peace, forever in our hearts. Services 10am, Friday, July 1, Riverside Nassau North Chapel, Great Neck. 1/3

Predeceased by husbands Harry Molbert and Reuben Leass. Loved by friends, family, her big dogs. At peace, forever in our hearts. Services 10am, Friday, July 1, Riverside Nassau North Chapel, Great Neck. 1/3
